name: La Pensione Svizzera

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a week staying at this delightful hotel. Had a room with sea view and balcony on the 4th floor (bit of a climb but got used to it!). Room was modern and comfortable. Air conditioning was very efficient. Found all the staff at the hotel friendly, helpful and professional. Breakfast was also very good (both the food and the service). Hotel location very convenient for Taormina centre. Would definitely visit this hotel again. Excellent value for money paying just 105 euros per night.
reviews.title: Excellent value

reviews.text: Stayed three nights in mid May on the 3rd floor. We live at nearly 6800 ft and walk lots, but carrying bags without a lift was not fun.
reviews.title: Needs a lift

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple

description: La Pensione Svizzera is a small charming hotel ideally located in Via Pirandello, the most central panoramic road of Taormina, where you’ll find yourself. Only 4 minutes walk from the city centre and Corso Umberto, Taormina’s main drag next to the cable-car that brings down to Mazzarò, Taormina’s most popular beach, as well as to the busterminal leading to the white-sandy beaches in the surroundings.
